alert.note: Alert for Clay; Jasper; Richland (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 22 at 3:52PM CST until February 22 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CST FOR SOUTHERN JASPER...RICHLAND AND CLAY COUNTIES... At 352 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ingraham to near Flora, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Sailor Springs and Ingraham around 355 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Clay City, Schnell, Noble, West Liberty, Dundas, Ste. Marie, Olney, Parkersburg, Calhoun and Claremont. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for south central and southeastern Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
